img_above_text:
![Wukong MadTiger 22.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/6b/Wukong_MadTiger_22.jpg)
There are certain times after performing slam attacks that he may keep his claws deep in the ground. If he continues to crouch down while charging up, it means he’ll rip his fists out to send a shower of rocks erupting in your path.
img_below_text:
Other times, he’ll begin to pick up a massive boulder, but instead of tossing it, he’ll leap across the room to personally deliver the massive rock to your face, which can deal a ton of damage.
![Wukong MadTiger 19.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/d/d6/Wukong_MadTiger_19.jpg)
summary_promot:

        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong MadTiger 22.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/6b/Wukong_MadTiger_22.jpg)
There are certain times after performing slam attacks that he may keep his claws deep in the ground. If he continues to crouch down while charging up, it means he’ll rip his fists out to send a shower of rocks erupting in your path."
        - Following Text: "Other times, he’ll begin to pick up a massive boulder, but instead of tossing it, he’ll leap across the room to personally deliver the massive rock to your face, which can deal a ton of damage.
![Wukong MadTiger 19.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/d/d6/Wukong_MadTiger_19.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a boss fight against "Mad Tiger" in *Black Myth: Wukong*. The player character is engaged in combat, wielding a staff, while the Mad Tiger enemy is airborne, seemingly mid-attack. The preceding and following text describe the boss's attack patterns, including slamming the ground to create rock eruptions and leaping with a boulder to deal significant damage. The image showcases the intense action and dynamic environment of the encounter.
